::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus tries to activate his boosters to rise at Cyclonus but he is not quick enough. The electrical pulse strikes the area where Rodimus was lifting off and the surge shocks Rodimus. The energy travels through his systems and Rodimus cries out in pain and drops to his knees. Smoke is coming from his armor in multiple places. Rodimus looks down exhausted. His energon reserves are nearly spent.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               
 --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus curses in his head. Cyclonus didn't come close enough for
 > what he had in mind. Time to change plans.
 > 
 > Rodimus uses his arms and springs up at Cyclonus for a dropkick.
 
 Cyclonus is caught on the side with a glancing blow from the kick and
 stumbled back a pace or two. Cyclonus' armor by this time is looking
 much the worse for wear, cracks, dents and scorch marks mar its once
 purple and silver hues, and yet he still looks confident as he takes a
 moment to assess his opponant. 
 
 Then with a sudden burst of power he leaped out of the water, his legs
 merging as he converts to his robot-hover mode. With a small smile he
 targets his cannon at Rodimus, and with a thought he fires a simple
 electrical pulse at Rodimus, knowing that even should he miss, the salt
 water would still carry the electrical current right to Rodimus as long
 as he was still close!
 
 Preston
 (Cyclonus)
